channel.title: world on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in world on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-28
item.description: LG Display shows off a versatile lineup of transparent OLED screens at CES 2022 (3 minute read) LG Display has unveiled several new concepts that will be on display at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-31
item.description: Nvidia is making a 3D map of the universe with the world’s most powerful AI supercomputer (2 minute read) Nvidia’s Perlmutter supercomputer is the fastest in the world for AI workloads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-01
item.description: ‘It will change everything’: DeepMind’s AI makes gigantic leap in solving protein structures (8 minute read) DeepMind’s AlphaFold can determine a protein’s 3D shape using its amino-acid sequence.
